title: store search
body: I have posted my 1st application on windows store, with 9 keywords. However none of the keywords seems to be working. I believe its a defect. I raised this in dev support but I am asked to add this issue here. Kindly look into the issue.

comments.body: Recently we've published Windows 10 UWP update for our existing Windows Phone 7.5 game - Yatzy Free - https://www.microsoft.com/store/apps/9wzdncrfj1rz

My friends have a problem with finding my app in Microsoft Store.
My app: Survarium ProfileR
https://www.microsoft.com/en-US/store/apps/survarium-profiler/9nblggh0jrp2
http://windowsphone.com/s?appid=98be467e-47c2-4aec-a506-814c770d9bdf
